description: The eldest of the Gowa brothers, he`s very ambitious and cleverly plots his rise to power first in the family by replacing his father as master of the house and then in the world by weaving a complex political and economic web. He`s obsessed with obtaining the power of the mysterious Gasaraki, that he believes will give him the ultimate supremacy, and will stop at nothing to acquire it.
name: Gouwa Kazukiyo
